articles.title: Apple's Services And Silicon Strategy To Fuel Margins, Justify High Valuation: Analyst
articles.content: BofA Securities analyst Wamsi Mohan maintained a Buy rating on Apple Inc (NASDAQ:AAPL) with a price target of $256. The rerating reflects the expected strong iPhone upgrade cycle in fiscal 2025 and 2026, driven by the need for the latest hardware to enable Gen AI features, higher growth in Services revenue, higher margins from more internally developed silicon, continuing capital returns, and AI features that can drive higher institutional ownership.
